Name: Stickman Destruction 2
About the game: Stickman Destruction 2 Stickman Destruction 2 is back! Goal is simple: You need to do a lot of damage to the stickmans to collect as many points as possible! With the collected points, you can unlock new vehicules and levels. Calculate the speed and movement of your vehicle. Shoot down as many stickers as possible on your way, see for their marked damage.In some locations there will be various items that will help you to score bigger points. The game will appeal to those who like to watch the real physics of the stickman character and the destruction of various types of transport and stickmans. FEATURES : *10 differents vehicules to unlock (bike, mine car, the famous hot dog car, dinosaur on a bike, armored car, etc...) *10 various levels to unlock. *Steam Leaderboard *Steam Achievements
